iicActor.fps commands¶

Submodules¶

This page list of all IIC FPS related commands.

Each command should be contain a description and their input arguments listed.

class iicActor.Commands.FpsCmd.BoresightLoop(visit, expTime, nExposures)¶

Bases: object

The state required to run a boresight measurement loop.

Basically, the Gen2 command knows about the telescope motion, and interleaves POPT2 rotations with requests to us to expose. At the end we are commanded to read the data and generate a new boresight.

property endFrame¶
nextFrameId()¶
property startFrame¶

Bases: object

Abort a boresight acquisition loop.

addBoresightPosition(cmd)¶

iic addBoresightPosition

angleConvergenceTest(cmd)¶

iic angleConvergenceTest phi|theta angleTargets=N [name=”SSS”] [comments=”SSS”]

Perform an angle convergence test (phi or theta).

Parameters

  • angleTargets (int) – angle targets.

  • name (str) – To be inserted in opdb:iic_sequence.name.

  • comments (str) – To be inserted in opdb:iic_sequence.comments.

fpsLoop(cmd)¶

iic fpsLoop [expTime=FF.F] [cnt=N]

Run an MCS+FPS loop, without moving cobras.

Parameters

  • expTime (float) – MCS Exposure time.

  • cnt (int) – Number of FPS images.

makeMotorMap(cmd)¶

iic makeMotorMap phi|theta stepsize=N repeat=N [@slowOnly] [name=”SSS”] [comments=”SSS”]

Make motorMap (phi or theta).

Parameters

  • stepsize (int) – Step size.

  • repeat (int) – Number of repeat.

  • slowOnly (bool) – only slow mode.

  • name (str) – To be inserted in opdb:iic_sequence.name.

  • comments (str) – To be inserted in opdb:iic_sequence.comments.

Parameters

  • nExposures (int) – Number of exposure.

targetConvergenceTest(cmd)¶

iic targetConvergenceTest ontime|speed totalTargets=N maxsteps=N [name=”SSS”] [comments=”SSS”]

Perform a target convergence test (ontime or speed).

Parameters

  • totalTargets (int) – Total targets.

  • maxsteps (int) – Maximum number of steps.

  • name (str) – To be inserted in opdb:iic_sequence.name.

  • comments (str) – To be inserted in opdb:iic_sequence.comments.
